mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, passwd, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email1}, #{email2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
select userid, passwd, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2 from member where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
select userid, passwd, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2 from member where userid = #{userid}
